scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run build:doc && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.upload: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "feat: $(date +%Y-%m-%d)" && git push origin master
scripts.commit:daily: git add data && git commit -m 'feat: add '$(date +%Y-%m-%d) && git tag v$(date +%Y.%m.%d)
scripts.publish:daily: git pull origin master && npm run commit:daily && git push origin master && git push origin v$(date +%Y.%m.%d)

gitHooks.pre-commit: npm run build && git add README.* && git add data
